name: Ninja Run (Beta version 0.1.02)
description:
Controls:  Press W to jump, press E to attack.

Hello! My name is Jason and i'm currently working on a game called Ninja Run!

this is a early beta version of the endless gamemode. Once it's finished it'll have way more gamemodes and lot's of features. i will be updating this web buildt so let me know if you find any bugs!

You can also join my discord server to keep up to date with all the progress that has been made! https://discord.gg/9jpeWC273M

Update 0.1.02 (emergency update)

---------------------------------------------------------------

changes: 

Made some changes to the score calculation, it's now 4x slower. 

Made the accileration 2x slower. 

new features 

You now kill an enemy when you jump on thier head!
